casebody.data:
No. 10-436. R. H., By His Parents and Next Friends, Emily H., et vir, Petitioner v. Plano Independent School District. 562 U.S. 1216, 131 S. Ct. 1471,

179 L. Ed. 2d 300,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1330. February 22, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 607 F.3d 1003.
